# The all-in-one commercialinsurance platform
We’re rethinking insurance for high-hazard industries. Shepherd combines blazing fast underwriting with complimentary world-class software to deliver real savings for clients.
Explore Shepherd
Trusted by the leading retail brokerages in commercial risk

Why Shepherd
## Specialty underwriters powered by world-class tech
Shepherd provides insurance capacity alongside risk management software, integrations to popular tools, and a curated app marketplace
![Decisions in hours instead of weeks](https://withshepherd.com/_next/static/media/decisions.6e2a1253.svg)
Decisions in hours instead of weeks
Eliminated administrative waste enables an average response time of just 12 hours
![Up to 25% premium savings](https://withshepherd.com/_next/static/media/price_check_value_prop.f5c7dd5d.svg)
Up to 25% premium savings
Automatic credits for customers who utilize leading technologies for safety and risk
![AI-powered risk reduction](https://withshepherd.com/_next/static/media/aiPowered.981f7a7d.svg)
AI-powered risk reduction
Free software to solve common risk management pain points and reduce expenses
Savings
## Partnered with the industry leading technologies
Unique data partnerships unlock meaningful premium savings for proactive clients
[Explore Savings](https://withshepherd.com/</solutions/savings>)

How it works
## A fully integrated insurance and software suite
Shepherd is the first MGU for large scale commercial risks that provides proactive solutions to drive premium savings for clients
1
Become a Shepherd policyholder
Purchase any Shepherd insurance product
2
Platform Onboarding
Kickoff with our team and start leveraging free resources
3
Improve loss controls and reduce claims
Leverage our risk management software and curated app marketplace
4
Receive preferred pricing and terms
Activate credits through the Rewards program
Customers
“The Shepherd experience was phenomenal”
We worked with the Shepherd team on an infrastructure project placement and the overall experience was phenomenal. Their initial review was thoughtful and efficient. There was clear communication throughout the process and flexibility to discuss specific requests. We and the Insured greatly value the relationship with Shepherd and look forward to continuing to grow together!
![Dana](https://withshepherd.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fdana.bdadd275.png&w=256&q=75)
Dana Moriarity
SVP Casualty Leader
National Construction Risk Management at McGriff
[Read the full case study](https://withshepherd.com/</case-studies/263m-highway-project-in-texas>)

Insurance Offerings
## Comprehensive coverage, from programs to projects
Our products are backed by several of the top capacity and reinsurance providers in the world
![Primary Casualty](https://withshepherd.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.datocms-assets.com%2F94105%2F1706845078-jason-dent-w3efhqxjkze-unsplash.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
Primary Casualty
General Liability, Commercial Auto, and Workers’ Compensation coverage offerings for annual contractor programs and projects
  * Projects / CIPs or annual programs
  * Limits up to $2M / $4M CGL & $2M CSL Commercial Auto 
  * A.M. Best A (Excellent), FSC XIII


[Learn more about Primary Casualty](https://withshepherd.com/</products/primary-casualty>)

generated_description:
**Shepherd: Reinventing Insurance for Commercial Construction**

Founded in 2020 and nestled in the vibrant tech hub of San Francisco, Shepherd is on a mission to modernize the insurance landscape specifically for commercial construction. As part of Y Combinator's W21 batch, this innovative company operates with a lean team of just 12 but aims to deliver a heavyweight impact in a high-hazard industry.

At its core, Shepherd offers a cutting-edge approach to insurance underwriting by integrating rapid response time—think decisions made in mere hours—and AI-driven risk management tools. They provide comprehensive insurance products like Primary Casualty (covering general liability, commercial auto, and workers’ compensation) and Excess Casualty (umbrella liability)—designed to meet the nuanced needs of their clients in construction.

### What Makes Shepherd Special?

1. **Speed**: With an average response time of 12 hours, Shepherd eliminates administrative waste in traditional insurance processes.
2. **Savings**: Their model enables clients to enjoy up to 25% savings on premiums, particularly for proactive users of safety technologies.
3. **Technology Integration**: Shepherd's risk management software is complemented by an app marketplace that partners with industry leaders like Procore and Autodesk. This not only enhances compliance but also drives down operational costs.
4. **Comprehensive Support**: From onboarding to claims management, Shepherd's framework is designed to streamline the experience for contractors at all levels.

### The Offerings

Shepherd's insurance products are backed by top-tier capacity and reinsurance providers. Their main offerings include:
- **Primary Casualty**: General liability and commercial auto coverage with limits up to $2M.
- **Excess Casualty**: Umbrella liability for contractor programs, offering coverage limits extending up to $10M.
- **Builder's Risk** (coming in Q1 2025): Designed for construction projects, providing critical coverage needed during construction phases.

### Why Choose Shepherd?

By partnering with some of the leading retail brokerages in commercial risk, Shepherd is redefining what’s possible in the insurance sector for construction. They don’t just sell policies; they deliver a robust, integrated experience that puts client needs at the forefront.

### Learn More

Curious about partnering with Shepherd? Visit their [website](https://withshepherd.com) for case studies, insights, and product offerings that could transform how you manage risk in your next construction project. Whether you're a contractor looking for significant savings or a broker seeking innovative solutions, Shepherd is here to guide you every step of the way.
